## pointOnLine() function

Calculates a point on the line from `fromPoint` to `toPoint` that is `distance` units along the length of the line.  pointOnLine

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function pointOnLine(fromPoint: PointXY, toPoint: PointXY, distance: number): PointXY;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fromPoint | [PointXY](./util.pointxy) | First point |
|  toPoint | [PointXY](./util.pointxy) | Second point |
|  distance | number | Distance along the length that the point should be located.  {<!-- -->PointXY<!-- -->} Point on the line, in the form <code>{ x:..., y:... }</code>. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[PointXY](./util.pointxy)
